sentences: Kõige kuulsam Eesti kunstnik nimetatakse Konrad Mägi.
context: Nimetatakse is the 3rd person singular present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'nimetama', which means 'to call' or 'to name'. It is used when referring to how something is commonly called or named. In the dictionary definition provided, it appears in a context about describing certain sounds produced near the alveolar ridge as being often called dental consonants because during their articulation the tongue tip approaches the upper gum ridge.
